name: Passenger Car
description: Modern sedans for 1–4 passengers (e.g., Fiat Egea, Toyota Corolla).

name: Minibus
description: Comfortable vans for 1–9 passengers (e.g., Mercedes Vito, VW Caravelle).

name: Crafter
description: Extended luxury vans for 1–14 passengers (e.g., Mercedes Sprinter).

name: UltraLux
description: Premium chauffeur-driven vehicles (e.g., Maybach, Mercedes S-Class).
